arStrings.szText: Increase elemental damage by Familiar type.

{c_important}Familiars{/c} apply effects around them every {c_number}[{SF_19}|1|]{/c} seconds according to their Element:
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Fire{/c}: Applies {c_number}{DOT:BURNING}{/c} Burning damage over {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds to enemies.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Cold{/c}: Applies {c_number}[SF_8|%|]{/c} Chill to enemies.
{icon:bullet, 1.2} {c_label}Lightning{/c}: Stuns enemies for {c_number}[SF_9]{/c} second.

Your {c_important}Familiars'{/c} elements now follow a set cycle through Fire, Cold, and Lightning when you cast any Skill.

While you have at least two different element {c_important}Familiars{/c} active, you gain {c_number}[SF_10*100|+%|]{/c} Damage Reduction.
While you have an active {c_important}Familiar{/c}, you deal {c_number}[SF_12*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage of its type.
